text: people aren't buying their bags to the
quality they're buying that bag because
they want to signal something to others
[Music]
counterfeits are obviously a big deal
for any company organization I can cut
into revenue stream and hurt business
and indeed if you look at things that
are counterfeit though you'll notice an
interesting pattern not all products
tend to be counterfeit if you look at
handbags for example you take two bags
one that has no logos on it and one that
has logos on it
logo bags are much more likely to
counterfeit and the reason very simply
is people aren't buying their bags for
the quality they're buying that bag
because they want to signal something to
others the larger the logo the easier it
is for people to see what they bought
and so bags are much more likely be
counterfeit if they have a large logo
rather than a small one but more
generally you might think that
counterfeits are a bad thing that they
hurt companies and organizations but
some researchers actually did a very
interesting study looking at whether
counterfeits could actually be a good
thing and the reason is because it
causes consumers to buy new things so
imagine your consumer a high-end
consumer you buy handbags you buy
sunglasses you buy a designer dress you
buy those things because you want to
stand out and be different from
everybody else but when counterfeiters
come along they make that item more
accessible to a broader set of people
and what was once unique those ones
different is now no longer so in fact
it's not only more mainstream and more
people have it but the signal sent by
buying it is different no longer you
ahead of the curve in the vanguard
you're now something that's more
mainstream and more popular and so
there's original users those folks that
bought that original high-priced bag
might have to diverge and buy something
else and so counterfeiting while it
seems bad can actually spur these cycles
of fads and fashions where something
catches on among a subculture a small
group then it becomes more mainstream
when it's counterfeited but it causes
that original group to move on to
something else
creating more revenue stream in the long
run for those fashion companies
[Music]
